question: Which Indian journalist has been named the winner of Prem Bhatia Award for political reporting?
explanation:
Indian journalist and Special Correspondent of the Indian Express Dipankar Ghose has won the Prem Bhatia Award for political reporting.
He covered various issues related to the Covid-19 pandemic including the migrant labour crisis. Peopleâ€™s Archive of Rural India (PARI), a journalism website has been selected for the award for the reporting on environmental and development issues.
